name: Digital Ark Pool
description: Our mission is to mobilize everyone to utilize their capital (time, money, knowledge, influence) to expand the development of society, through a unique experience of co-contribution that facilitates adoption of the Cardano protocol, reveals new possibilities, and ignites the public imagination worldwide. We envision a world where as many people as possible are empowered to invest their time or money into an ecosystem that solves problems using the Cardano protocol.
